| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | evlsscasrng.q | |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) |

| 21 | 20 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( C ` X ) ) = ( ( ( I evalSub S ) ` B ) ` ( ( algSc ` ( I mPoly ( S |`s B ) ) ) ` X ) ) ) |
